name: recommendarr
description: Recommendarr is a self-hosted tool that recommends movies and shows from your media library based on ratings and usage. It integrates with Plex, Radarr, and Sonarr.

features.title: Smart Recommendations
features.description: Suggest movies and shows based on viewing history and ratings from your Plex library

features.title: Plex Integration
features.description: Analyze watch history and user ratings to understand preferences and patterns

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Automatically add recommended content to your download queue for acquisition

features.title: Collaborative Filtering
features.description: Generate suggestions based on what similar users enjoyed in their libraries

features.title: Trending Content
features.description: Discover popular movies and shows that match your taste preferences

features.title: Watchlist Management
features.description: Save recommendations for later and track which suggestions you've already seen

features.title: Rating Analysis
features.description: Use IMDb, TMDb, and Trakt ratings to filter and rank recommendations

features.title: Genre Preferences
features.description: Fine-tune suggestions by specifying favorite genres or excluding unwanted categories
